name: COMPASS MINERALS INTERNATIONAL, INC.
description: Compass Minerals International, Inc. is a leading global producer of essential minerals, primarily focused on salt and sulfate of potash (SOP) products. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Overland Park, Kansas, the company plays a crucial role in the supply of minerals used in a variety of applications, including deicing roads, agricultural fertilizers, and specialty products for industrial uses. Compass Minerals operates a diverse portfolio of assets, including the largest rock salt mine in North America and one of the world's largest sulfate of potash plants. The company’s commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to minimize environmental impact and promote responsible resource management. Through innovation and strategic investments, Compass Minerals aims to meet the growing demand for high-quality minerals while maintaining operational excellence and safety. The company's mission is to support its customers and communities by providing reliable access to essential minerals that improve quality of life and foster economic growth.
